name: Rip Van Bubsy
description:
Bubsy ages 10 years every time he falls asleep. Can you solve the mystery of Bubsy? Unofficial fangame made in 7 days and released September 2009.

Made in Adventure Game Studio. As of 2022, it works best in compatability mode for Window XP.

Controls:

left click - walk, interact

right click - look at

esc - menu

right-clicking bubsy brings up inventory
